steps.name: When user adds products with "Store Pickup" shipping method to the cart
When User should click on checkout button
When User will get model popup to click on continue as guest user
When User should provides Pickup person information like Valid Name, Last Name, Email ID and Phone number
When User will click on payment and order review button
When User should able to select Payment Method as PLCC
When User will add the Michaels Credit Card Details like -Name on Card,Card Number,Expiration Date,CVV and Billing address details like Name,Last name,address,City ,State,Zip code and Phone Number
When User will Enter GiftCard Number, PIN and apply
When User will click on Place order button
When User will redirected to Order Confirmation Page
When User should find Order confirmation with order number
